entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quick grid does not render in .net 7 blazor server project #48292
  • Blazor missing assembly reference with 7.0.302 #48291
  • Allow creating Razor class libraries with `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Server.Circuits` namespace #48290
  • Update RequestDelegateGenerator to use interceptors language feature #48289
    8.0-preview6
  • SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter cannot handle multiple encodings #48286
    Backlog
  • RZ10012 warning and MSBuild 17.6 #48281
  • Exception calling Dispose on IJSInProcessObjectReference instance in Blazor WebAssembly #48280
    8.0-preview6
  • .NET 8 Preview 4 - Blazor WASM - Hot Reload broken with dotnet watch #48275
  • Blazor SSR: Failed to read environment variable [DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS] #48274
  • .net8 preview 4: Hosting environment not detected via Blazor-Environment header #48271
    8.0-preview5
  • Experimental Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets and multi-target framework builds fails #48270

Closed

  • Add Meter/Counters to track hits for each route/endpoint #46361
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction, mvc #48177
  • AspNetCoreModuleV2 should be able to restart executable if startup fails #47432
  • If InvariantGlobalization is enabled by default, SqlClient will throw an exception #48186
    8.0-preview5
  • Kestrel config behaves differently when set using env vars vs. in-code #45801
    8.0-preview5
  • Error - There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm' #48230
  • Create a provider to pass parameters in blazor components #48282
  • How to Base64UrlEncode in Blazor WebAssembly client now that Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities has been deprecated? #48068
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features nuget package #48266
  • Older versions of nuget packages for Blazor Webassembly hosted project #47823
    8.0-preview5
  • Random slow response time when application low load #48262
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #48255

PullRequests

Created

  • Add debug output to HttpContext and friends #48293
    area-runtime
  • Bump selenium-standalone to 8.3.0 - allow E2E testing on osx-arm64 #48288
    needs-area-label
  • Update JSInProcessObjectReference.cs #48287
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Add new Blazor Web Template #48285
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Update discovery APIs and automatically configure the endpoints based on the discovered RenderModes #48283
    area-blazor
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • DisableInferBodyFromParameters in RDG. #48269
    area-runtime, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview5
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Print exit code when trim test fails #48253
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Ship Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities, Microsoft.Net.Http.Headers as packages #48265
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview5
  • Update CredScanSuppressions.json after DataProtection move #48263
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • DOM merging #48258
    area-blazor
  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #48243
    area-infrastructure
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime, area-signalr
  • Change API template to only use Invariant Globalization in Native AOT… #48238
    area-mvc
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 8.0-preview5
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #48207
    area-runtime
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly #48154
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, pending-ci-rerun
